9h ago
Well, the Montreal Canadiens snapped Ottawa's 6 game winning streak and now find themselves in a playoff spot. TSN Hockey insider, Darren Dreger, reacts to the Habs run and also brings us up to speed on the NHL GM meetings in Florida
19h ago
On the Delmar Canadiens post game show, Mitch Gallo, JP O'Connor, Victor Findlay and Luca Scott talk about the Montreal Canadiens beating the Ottawa Senators at home, the team's mentality, Habs pushing into a playoff spot, Montembeault's performance and much more.
